downloadDescription: Describes the set of conventions for the use of XML and other widely available technologies to describe the content and appearance of paginated documents.
detailsSection: This XML Paper Specification, or XPS, describes the set of conventions for the use of XML and other widely available technologies to describe the content and appearance of paginated documents.
systemRequirementsSection:
Windows 98 / Windows 2000 or later
Microsoft Office 97 or later
installInstructionSection: Select "Save this file to disk" to download to your local machine.
